task.title: Uploading Source Audio
task.shortdesc: Upload an audio file from a TV show or movie.

prereq.p: You need an audio file in MP3 or WAV format.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Audio Upload page.
step.info: From the left sidebar, click Audio SlicerLoad Source.

step.cmd: Select a Drama from the dropdown (e.g., "Friends").

info.note: Creating new Dramas is currently not available to users.

step.cmd: Enter the Season and Episode numbers.

info.note: Adding an episode title is currently not available to users.

step.cmd: Click Choose File and select your audio file.

result.p: The audio is uploaded and automatically chunked. You can now browse the chunks.
